scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.start-concurrently: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run build && npm run serve"
scripts.build-concurrently: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.serve-gatsby: npm run build-gatsby && cd frontend && npm run serve
